post:
Hello,

You can get 50% extra disk space on all KVM packages except KVM HDD 500 and KVM Storage CA. Please use coupon MORESPACE. All SSD packages are eligible too. Deal of the day packages are not eligible.

Example specs

**KVM HDD Limited CA**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon E3-1245 V2
Unlimited CPU core 3.6GHz
2GB ECC RAM
300GB HDD RAID-5 (450GB with coupon MORESPACE)
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbps bandwidth
1 IPv4
DDoS protection
Location - Canada
Price - $4.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=93
</pre>

Check our website for more KVM offers.

The payment gateway is 2Checkout (PayPal) and CoinPayments (BTC, ETH, BCH).

For anyone interested, there is also an affiliate program - https://www.wishosting.com/plugin/support_manager/knowledgebase/view/18/affiliate-program/1/
